mapper.select: select f.film_name as filmName, i.film_en_name as filmEnName, f.img_address as imgAddress, i.film_score as score, i.film_score_num as scoreNum, f.film_box_office as totalBox, (SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(show_name) from cat_dict t where FIND_IN_SET(t.UUID, (SELECT REPLACE(TRIM(BOTH '#' FROM film_cats),'#',',') from film WHERE film.UUID =t.UUID )) ) as info1, CONCAT((SELECT show_name FROM source_dict t WHERE t.UUID=f.UUID),'/', i.film_length,'分钟') as info2, CONCAT(f.film_time,'/', (SELECT show_name FROM source_dict t WHERE t.UUID=f.UUID),'上映') as info3, i.film_length, f.film_time from film f,film_info i where f.UUID = i.UUID and f.film_name LIKE #{filmName};

select f.film_name as filmName, i.film_en_name as filmEnName, f.img_address as imgAddress, i.film_score as score, i.film_score_num as scoreNum, f.film_box_office as totalBox, (SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(show_name) from cat_dict t where FIND_IN_SET(t.UUID, (SELECT REPLACE(TRIM(BOTH '#' FROM film_cats),'#',',') from film WHERE film.UUID =t.UUID )) ) as info1, CONCAT((SELECT show_name FROM source_dict t WHERE t.UUID=f.UUID),'/', i.film_length,'分钟') as info2, CONCAT(f.film_time,'/', (SELECT show_name FROM source_dict t WHERE t.UUID=f.UUID),'上映') as info3, i.film_length, f.film_time from film f,film_info i where f.UUID = i.UUID and f.UUID = #{uuid};
